items.sentence: I actually don\'t feel like going to the city.
Tom wants a full report by this time tomorrow.
Tom plans to stick around to see what happens.
Tom sometimes has trouble keeping his balance.
Tom is going to eventually be able to do that.
You told Tom that he was adopted, didn\'t you?
I think that Tom\'s French has improved a lot.
I\'m not sure that Tom needs to do that again.
I\'m not sure that Tom would let Mary do that.
Tom told me that he wasn\'t planning on going.
Tom doesn\'t remember where he parked his car.
Where would you like me to put your suitcases?
In my opinion, Tom is the guy we need to hire.
I have something here that I want to show you.
I\'ve done many interesting things in my life.
What\'s your favorite convenience store chain?
I don\'t know what Tom will be doing tomorrow.
I don\'t let my children speak French at home.
Tom will eat just about anything you give him.
Tom will help Mary do that if she asks him to.
